FuncDef:
The ftp ipv6 server enable command enables the FTP server ipv6 function on a device, allowing ipv6 FTP users to log in.
The undo ftp ipv6 server command disables the FTP server ipv6 function on a device, preventing ipv6 FTP users from logging in. The ftp ipv6 server enable command enables the FTP server ipv6 function on a device, allowing ipv6 FTP users to log in. The undo ftp ipv6 server command disables the FTP server ipv6 function on a device, preventing ipv6 FTP users from logging in. By default, the FTP server ipv6 function is disabled.
ExtraInfo: To allow users to remotely manage files on the local client, you can run this command to enable the FTP server function, allowing the FTP users to log in.
